data.text: @osorojnr_ Women have rights too, incase you forget #WomenLeadersEA
@osorojnr_ Speak up against any threat women might be facing in the society #WomenLeadersEA
@osorojnr_ GBV is no more ,let women enjoy life .#WomenLeadersEA
@osorojnr_ Let's all embrace the woman and enjoy the comfort their give back #womenLeadersEA
@osorojnr_ Today is the best day for this ,let's speak out #WomenLeadersEA

@osorojnr_ Create a safer environment for everyone by challenging your peers to reflect on their own behaviour and speaking up when someone crosses the line, or by enlisting the help of others if you donâ€™t feel safe. #WomenLeadersEA

@osorojnr_ Violence can take many forms, including sexual harassment in the workplace and in public spaces. Take a stand by calling it out when you see it: catcalling, inappropriate sexual comments and sexist jokes are never okay. #WomenLeadersEA
@osorojnr_ It's now or never say no to GBV #WomenLeadersEA
@osorojnr_ No more GBV  , our women leaders are doing everything they can to put an end to this #WomenLeadersEA
